definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: A woman's work is never done .
sentences.chinese: 女人家的工作，永远做不完。

sentences.english: Curiosity you know is the curse of our sex, and that 's the fact.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，好奇是我们女人家的通病，这是真的。
新生儿送礼会是女人家的事。

sentences.english: This job is too heavy for a lady. ;
sentences.chinese: 这种工作对女人家太粗重。

definition: very masculine guy/a real man/(used ironically) a grown man
girl/servant girl/(used deprecatingly, but sometimes also as a term of endearment)
erhua variant of 兒媳婦|儿媳妇[er2 xi2 fu5]
lord/master/young gentleman/male prostitute/catamite/mahjong player disqualified by unintentionally taking in the wrong number of dominoes/(old form of address for one's husband) husband
older brother's wife/sister-in-law/(polite address to a younger married woman) sister
